analysis.description:
Reentrancy in FieldCoinSale.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#1092-1110):
	External calls:
	- objFieldCoin._withdraw(msg.sender,_investor.tokenSent) (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#1097-1100)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_investor.weiReceived) (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#1101-1102)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investors (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#1105-1106)
	- investors (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#1106-1108)
	- investors (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#1109)

Crowdsale.constructor (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#500-513) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#507-508)

Crowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#627-628) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#627-628)

FieldCoinSale.changeOpeningTIme (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#1003-1010) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp,opening time is less than current time) (/unique_contracts/0x63c339fd5aec526d6d2fb6acbec1d5847f704fa2.sol#1008-1009)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp,opening time is less than current time)
